features.name: eye_contact
features.question: Does the child make eye contact during interactions?

features.name: responds_name
features.question: Does the child respond when their name is called?

features.name: pointing
features.question: Does the child point to objects to show interest?

features.name: pretend_play
features.question: Does the child engage in pretend/symbolic play?

features.name: repetitive_behaviour
features.question: Does the child show repetitive movements (hand-flapping, rocking)?

features.name: sensory_sensitivity
features.question: Does the child show sensitivity to sounds, textures, lights, or touch?

features.name: plays_alone
features.question: Does the child prefer to play alone rather than with others?

features.name: gestures
features.question: Does the child use gestures (waving, nodding, showing objects)?

features.name: delayed_speech
features.question: Does the child have delayed speech or use very few words compared to peers?

features.name: restricted_interests
features.question: Does the child have intense interest in specific objects or topics?
